name: Carefit India
overview:
Being a reputed name, we test all of our machines for their best therapeutic results before launching into the market. We make peaple learn & promote towards various natural alternate pain relief & weight loss therapy which are highly effective even for the cases where other medical therapies have already failed. Some people also think that why our machines are so much cheaper, almost with 50% - 90% discounted price as compared to the price of other similar products in the same segment, from other korean companies. Most of the big Korean
companies have setup free therapy centres all over although there is nothing free in this world. They tend to cover up their centre expenses & dealer margin etc from the cost of their machines itself which make most of their machines almost 200%-800% more costly. While Carefit machines are very low priced due to no middle man and our strong willingness to serve huge community at lowest possible prices. Carefit Machines are 100% authentic, CE & ROHS approved, genuine and gives the same miraculous health benefits to everyone.
